title: Party at the Lunar Pack
description: One night with his sexy and growly neighbours turns his whole world upside down!   Roy is invited to the housewarming dinner of his rich new neighbours, unknowing that behind their sexy appearance is more than the eye can see. First Sam corners him but at the end of the night he enjoys both Sam and Clyde in a night to remember.  An 8,000 word sexy story about a man who canâ€™t help being attracted to two very sexy werewolves.
author: Rosa Swann
